banshee.name: Banshee
banshee.strength: Only targets one player at a time if they are in the building.

demon.name: Demon
demon.strength: Extremely agressive.  Will hunt earlier and more often.
demon.weakness: Using correct Ouija board questions does not drain sanity.

jinn.name: Jinn
jinn.strength: Moves faster the further away you are from it.
jinn.weakness: Cutting off the building’s power supply will limit the Jinn’s speed.

mare.name: Mare
mare.strength: More aggressive when the lights in the room are off.  Likes to switch off lights.
mare.weakness: More passive when the lights are on.

oni.name: Oni
oni.strength: More activity with more than 1 person in the room.  Can throw objects quickly.
oni.weakness: Being more active makes it easier to find.

phantom.name: Phantom
phantom.strength: Looking at the Phantom will reduce your sanity 2x more.
phantom.weakness: The phantom will be invisible in the photo and dissapear when you take a photo, except during a hunt.

poltergeist.name: Poltergeist
poltergeist.strength: Can throw multiple objects at once.
poltergeist.weakness: Ineffective in empty rooms with no throwables.

revenant.name: Revenant
revenant.strength: 2x speed when chasing someone, can freely switch target during chase.
revenant.weakness: 0.5x speed when it's not chasing anyone.

shade.name: Shade
shade.strength: Heavilty reduced activity and hunts with more than 1 person in the room.
shade.weakness: Less likely to hunt if players are grouped together.

spirit.name: Spirit
spirit.weakness: Smudge sticks will stop the ghost from hunting for 2x the amount.

wraith.name: Wraith
wraith.strength: Won't leave UV footprints when walking in salt, can teleport to a random player's location.
wraith.weakness: Stepping in salt will increase the ghost's activity.

yurei.name: Yurei
yurei.weakness: Using smudge sticks on the ghost will cause it to not wander.

yokai.name: Yokai
yokai.strength: Talking near a Yokai will anger it and increase it's chance of attacking.
yokai.weakness: When hunting, a Yokai can only hear voices close to it.

goryo.name: Goryo
goryo.strength: Can only be seen with the D.O.T.S Projecter, or with the camera if nobody is nearby.
goryo.weakness: Doesn't roam from the ghost room much.

crucifix.name: Crucifix
crucifix.fullText: Prevent the Ghost from hunting with a Crucifix

event.name: Event
event.fullText: Have a member of your team witness a Ghost Event

motion.name: Motion
motion.fullText: Detect a Ghosts presence with a Motion Sensor

photo.name: Photo
photo.fullText: Capture a photo of the Ghost

emf.name: EMF
emf.fullText: Find evidence of the paranormal with an EMF Reader

smudge.name: Smudge
smudge.fullText: Cleanse the area near the Ghost using Smudge Sticks

candle.name: Candle
candle.fullText: Detect a Ghost presence with a Candle

salt.name: Salt
salt.fullText: Get a Ghost to walk through Salt

hunt.name: Hunt
hunt.fullText: Escape the Ghost during a Hunt with no deaths

repel.name: Repel
repel.fullText: Use Smudge Sticks while the Ghost is hunting a player
